alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:12AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, Jefferson, Taylor and Madison Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1012 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Boston to 6 miles northwest of Monticello to 11 miles east of Tallahassee to near Florida A And M. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Mayo, Perry, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Alma, Pinland, Cody, Jug Island, Pinetta, Drifton, Scanlon, Lovett, Foley, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida.
